short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Much needed interface improvements for Jira

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever wished that large Kanban boards could not be squished? Now you can set your own custom Column width for all of your cards on all of your boards.

~And what about that "Detail View"? Wouldn't it be cool if you could resize it to whatever size you wanted it to be with a simple drag of your mouse? Now you can! ‚ÄúBetter JIRA‚Äù unlocks your productivity, getting the software out of your way and into the background where it belongs!~ JIRA added this feature so we no longer need to add it!

Also including "Standup Mode" that removes all of the clutter to keep your Standups focused and to the point!

Features:
* Horizontal Scroll of Kanban boards
* Resizable Cards on Kanban boards
* Resizable Detail View (removed, this is now a default feature in JIRA)
* Open Github Links in a new tab
* Standup Mode that clears out the clutter of side navigations

**Note**: Access to all sites is requested to allow this plugin to work on JIRA instances that are not hosted by Atlassian, this extension only runs on JIRA instances.
